item.title: Sobre
item.description: Overview The author was born in Lavras City, Minas Gerais, Brazil, in 1995. His native language is Brazilian Portuguese, but speaks, writes, and reads in English too. Arthur cared about the environment as a child - a topic he would study years later to become an environmental engineer. The following text aims to give the reader an overview of his career so far. | Currently, Arthur Boari is developing his master’s research in the area of air pollution — investigating trends in time series of Particulate Matter and Tropospheric Ozone from capital cities in the southeastern region of Brazil.
